BetterDeal¶

We developed our application with the Python-based Django web-framework. Here you can get an overview about the different modules of the project and about the architecture. (Because we used Django, some materials will be written from the original Django documentation: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.2/)

What is Django?

"Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. It’s free and open source."
https://www.djangoproject.com/

How to load the web application?

After we downloaded the project we need the python interpreter and the Django framework, which can be downloaded from here:

  • Python: https://www.python.org/
  • Django: https://www.djangoproject.com/download/

Once we have everything, we have to use command line to redirect ourselves to the directory which contains a so-called "manage.py" file. We have to type the command "python manage.py runserver" and it starts a server. In our browser we should type: "localhost:8000/app" and the application will appear right away.
